Otate is =E5=BE=A1=E9=A4=A8. Think of it as a word like "White House" - it =
refers to where Kenshin originally had his Kanto Kanrei offices. The locati=
on is Kasugayama Castle - modern day Joetsu City in Niigata.

If you put th=
ese coordinates into Google Maps it will give you a sense of where this is =
today:
37.146689,138.205553

Hope others can help on the sibling rivalry pa=
rt!

fine too.

ously allowing Oda expansion from Echizen through to Ecchu.
